input.sentences: i was out walking downtown one day .
i saw many unique buildings and apartments .
i stopped at some of the shops to browse .
after a while i decided to head back to my apartment .
i was glad to be back home .
output.sentences: The man left his apartment for a stroll downtown.
He enjoyed the older buildings,marvelingat how architecture had changed over the decades.
He browsed through a couple of he stores.
He took a different route home, to see different parts of the town.
He finally returned to his home, in time for lunch.
